com.adobe.acs.commons.fam

Class DeferredActions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adobe.acs.commons.fam.DeferredActions

  • @Service(value=DeferredActions.class)
public final class DeferredActions
extends Object
    Various deferred actions to be used with the ActionManager

      • filterNotMatching

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • filterOutSubassets

        public BiFunction<org.apache.sling.api.resource.ResourceResolver,String,Boolean> filterOutSubassets()
        Exclude subassets from processing
        Returns:
        true if node is not a subasset

      • filterNonAssets

        public BiFunction<org.apache.sling.api.resource.ResourceResolver,String,Boolean> filterNonAssets()
        Determine if node is a valid asset, skip any non-assets It's better to filter via query if possible to avoid having to use this
        Returns:
        True if asset

      • filterAssetsWithOutdatedRenditions

        public BiFunction<org.apache.sling.api.resource.ResourceResolver,String,Boolean> filterAssetsWithOutdatedRenditions()
        This filter identifies assets where the original rendition is newer than any of the other renditions. This is an especially useful function for updating assets with missing or outdated thumbnails.
        Returns:
        True if asset has no thumbnails or outdated thumbnails

      • retryAll

        public BiConsumer<org.apache.sling.api.resource.ResourceResolver,String> retryAll(int retries,
                                                                         long pausePerRetry,
                                                                         BiConsumer<org.apache.sling.api.resource.ResourceResolver,String> action)
        Retry provided action a given number of times before giving up and throwing an error. Before each retry attempt, the resource resolver is reverted so when using this it is a good idea to commit from your action directly.
        Parameters:
        retries - Number of retries to attempt
        pausePerRetry - Milliseconds to wait between attempts
        action - Action to attempt
        Returns:
        New retry wrapper around provided action

      • startSyntheticWorkflows

        Run nodes through synthetic workflow
        Parameters:
